channel.title: Yan Li's Webpage
channel.description: Recent content on Yan Li's Webpage

item.description: {{ partial "head.html" . }} {{ partial "navbar.html" . }} ABOUT ME Hi, I'm Yan Li! I'm pursuing my Ph.D. degree in Statistics at Departmemt of Statistics, University of Connecticut from starting from 2016. I recieved my B.S. degree in Statistics from Renmin University of China in 2016. I enjoy using R and Python to do statistical analysis. And I'm currently working on developing statistical models and R packages for climate change and errors-in-variables models.
{{ partial "head.html" . }} {{ partial "navbar.html" . }} Contact University of Connecticutyan.4.li@uconn.edu : LiYanStat {{ partial "script.html" . }}
